ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Re: gear and spocket
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Unfortunately, no.  The only place other than Ak Anon/Steamfont to get tinkering supplies is the Overthere outpost, and due to the prices being doubled, I
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Nov 20, 2000 at 03:27:41PM -0000, nico@... wrote:
> I'm thinking on working on my Firiona Vie faction, as I'll have to
> fuck that Venril Sathir (currently amiable), and because the prices
> there suck rock. Are there tinkering supplies there?

Unfortunately, no. The only place other than Ak'Anon/Steamfont to get
tinkering supplies is the Overthere outpost, and due to the prices being
doubled, I don't really count that as an option.

> Also, is there a way to raise merchant faction in Ak'Anon without
> lowering Dark Reflection? I'm down to apprehensive after just one
> clockwork killed in SolA ... duh!

Check on Allakhazam's. He has an extensive database of factions
cross-referenced by NPC and quest. http://everquest.allakhazam.com

Pasketti of Povar
